multiplayerStart2 module¶

multiplayerStart2.game_state()[source]¶

A function that looks for host :return: 1 if opponent was found | 0 if opponent wasn’t found

multiplayerStart2.playerName1(id)[source]¶

A function that looks for name of Player1 :param id - id of game :return: name of opponent

multiplayerStart2.playerName2(id)[source]¶

A function that looks for name of Player2 :param id - id of game :return: name of opponent

multiplayerStart2.readLast(name, id)[source]¶

Function that reads letter from the database :param name - player name :param id - id of game

multiplayerStart2.readWord(id)[source]¶

Function that reads letter from the database :param id - id of game :return word form database

multiplayerStart2.search(nick)[source]¶

A function that looks for an opponent :param nick - nick :return: 1 if opponent was found | 0 if opponent wasn’t found

multiplayerStart2.sendLast(char, id)[source]¶

A function that send to database letter chosen :param char - char :param id - id of game
